metadata.title: CVE-2024-36618 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
FFmpeg n6.1.1 has a vulnerability in the AVI demuxer of the libavformatlibrary which allows for an integer overflow, potentially resulting in adenial-of-service (DoS) condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7.0
libavcodec-extra - 7.0
libavcodec-extra60 - 7.0
libavcodec60 - 7.0
libavdevice60 - 7.0
libavfilter-extra - 7.0
libavfilter-extra9 - 7.0
libavfilter9 - 7.0
libavformat-extra - 7.0
libavformat-extra60 - 7.0
libavformat60 - 7.0
libavutil58 - 7.0
libpostproc57 - 7.0
libswresample4 - 7.0
libswscale7 - 7.0
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0').
